A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 16, 2010''', at 22:10 UTC.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* [[Level previewer]].<ref>https://twitter.com/notch/status/16338955146</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* If the player opened a world in the previewer, it would corrupt the world's {{cd|level.dat}} by deleting player's [[inventory]].<ref>https://twitter.com/notch/status/16340748581</ref>
